title: "Boulder robotics startup surpasses 7,000 reservations for self-driving lawnmower"
excerpt: "More than 7,000 people have reserved their spots in line for commercial-grade, self-driving lawnmowers developed by Boulder robotics company Scythe Robotics. Scythe Robotics, founded in 2018, remained in stealth mode for nearly three years as it developed its autonomous technology."
